Description.Name: Thumper Cannon Mk. 2
Description.Details:
The Thumper Cannon Mk. 2 is Blackwell Industries attempt to improve on the Bull Shark's Thumper Cannon. It shaves off 2 tons of weight by using advanced FT design tech to optimize the design and construction.

When fired, it deals devastating damage to all units within the targeted area - often destroying lighter 'Mechs and vehicles entirely.

Only a single artillery piece may be mounted on any 'Mech.
